column5: Hey,  Just wondering if anyone has hit up the Bay this week at all? My buddy and I are thinking about going to Picton Saturday for a morning fish. A few people have told me to wait another few weeks before going. Do they have the right idea?  Thanks for any info.  *Stoty
We will be down on Sat.  Why not start going now?  We have been catching fish, although it has been tough.  The weather last weekend made things tough.
Was out there today in Picton. Eyes seemed slowed at least for me anyways. Only saw one other eye being pulled from the water. I'll be back in November forsure.
I think that there is a fall walleye tournament on Sat.and Sun. Check out http://forums.quintefishing.com/phpBB2/. there might be some information on there.
